name: VR Bike Tour/Exercise in 22nd Century World
name_original: VR Bike Tour/Exercise in 22nd Century World
description:
A project called "Earth 2050" (Earth 2050) described the life of urban residents around the world in the near future.

Futurists also predicted the situation in some large cities in 2050, believing that they will also undergo technological upgrading.

Skyscrapers will reach 30 miles (approximately 4800 meters) by then, and space travel and space ports will become a reality.

"Transportation on the ground and inside the building will be completely carried out in the form of pods, and elevators will also be replaced by pods."

We have built a future city in 2050 through simulation, for cyclists to tour by bike in VR.
